it.polimi.travlendarplus.entities.tickets

Class PeriodTicket

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.travlendarplus.entities.GenericEntity
      • it.polimi.travlendarplus.entities.EntityWithLongKey
        • it.polimi.travlendarplus.entities.tickets.Ticket
          • it.polimi.travlendarplus.entities.tickets.PeriodTicket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Entity(name="PERIOD_TICKET")
public class PeriodTicket
extends Ticket
    This JPA class represent a ticket whose validity is related to a period of time ( es. monthly ). It decorate any other type of ticket, in order to represent their validity in time
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • checkTicketValidityAfterTravelAssociation

        public void checkTicketValidityAfterTravelAssociation(TravelComponent travelComponentToBeAdded)
                                               throws TicketNotValidException
        Checks if the ticket remains applicable if the specified travel component is added in the list of travelComponents that will take advantage of the ticket
        Specified by:
        checkTicketValidityAfterTravelAssociation in class Ticket
        Parameters:
        travelComponentToBeAdded - travel component that might be added
        Throws:
        TicketNotValidException - if the travel component exceed the period of validity of the ticket
